colourSchemeDesc: We are on the dark side, you too?
accentColourDesc: Change accent colour to your liking.
disableBlurDesc: Disable blur incase of performance problems in older devices.
disableAnimationsDesc: Disable animations incase of performance problems in older devices, or your personal preference.
aboutDesc: This web app is my project for Operating system lab. it is completely open source, and under MPL v2.0. you can find the source code at the following link on GitHub.
